summary.span: 为 .aspx 文件实现分析器。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用此类分析.aspx 页。ASP.NET uses this class to parse .aspx pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数设置页进行分析期间使用默认值。This constructor sets default values to be used during page parsing.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 是否应优化其内部对 ASP.NET 分析页或控件时遇到的长字符串的处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether ASP.NET should optimize its internal handling of long strings that are encountered when ASP.NET parses a page or control.

value.span: 如果 ASP.NET 应优化其内部对长字符串的处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if ASP.NET should optimize its internal handling of long strings; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，ASP.NET 页分析器将转换为临时资源字符串包含 256 或多个字符的文本字符串。By default, the ASP.NET page parser converts literal strings that contain 256 or more characters into a temporary resource string. 此属性可以设置为`false`以禁用此行为，而不是直接向响应流中写入文本字符串。This property can be set to `false` in order to disable this behavior and instead to write the literal string directly to the response stream. 此属性只能在之前的 Global.asax 文件中设置`PreApplicationStart`事件发生。This property can only be set in the Global.asax file before the `PreApplicationStart` event occurs. 在任何时候，可以读取此属性。This property can be read at any time.

returns.span: 返回所请求页的编译实例。
